hint.title: New to editing?

whatIsIt.title: What is Editing Mode?
whatIsIt.description: Editing Mode allows you to correct transcript text, assign speakers, and reorganize the structure of the transcript. All changes are tracked with full history for auditability.

workflow.title: Basic Workflow
workflow.step1: Click on any utterance to edit its text inline
workflow.step2: Press Enter to save or Escape to cancel
workflow.step3: Use context menu (right-click) for advanced operations like moving utterances or extracting segments

legend.title: Visual Legend
legend.userEdited: Green underline - Text edited by a user
legend.aiCorrected: Blue underline - Text auto-corrected by AI

fixText.question: How do I fix incorrect text?
fixText.answer: Click the utterance, edit the text inline, then press Enter to save your changes.

assignSpeaker.question: How do I assign speakers?
assignSpeaker.answer: Click the speaker badge on the segment, then search for a speaker or select 'Unknown Speaker'.

splitSegment.question: How do I split a segment (A-B-A pattern)?
splitSegment.answer: When Speaker B's utterances are incorrectly included in Speaker A's segment, select the utterances to extract using Shift+Click for ranges, then press 'e' or right-click and select 'Extract Segment'.

moveUtterances.question: How do I move utterances between segments?
moveUtterances.answer: Right-click on an utterance and select 'Move to previous segment' or 'Move to next segment'.

createSegment.question: How do I create a new empty segment?
createSegment.answer: Click the '+' button on any segment card to create a new segment before or after it.

findUnknown.question: How do I find unknown speakers quickly?
findUnknown.answer: Use the 'Unknown Speaker' button in the editing bar to jump to the next segment with an unidentified speaker.

userEdited.title: User Edited
userEdited.description: Text that has been modified by a human editor. This indicates verified and corrected content.
userEdited.example: This text was edited by a user

aiCorrected.title: AI Corrected
aiCorrected.description: Text that was automatically corrected by AI tasks. These changes are suggested improvements but may need review.
aiCorrected.example: This text was corrected by AI

selected.title: Selected for Extraction
selected.description: Bold text indicates utterances selected for extraction into a new segment. Use this when Speaker B's utterances are incorrectly included in Speaker A's segment (A-B-A pattern).

toasts.selectionErrorDiffSegments: Cannot extract utterances from different segments at once.
toasts.invalidOperationExtractAll: Cannot extract all utterances. Use 'Change Speaker' instead.
toasts.invalidOperationExtractStartEnd: Cannot extract from the start or end of a segment. Selection must be strictly in the middle.
toasts.reviewCompletedDescription: The transcript review has been marked as complete.
